meta.job_title: Principal Product Development Project Management Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Leads cross functional teams to manage projects for product development and ongoing lifecycle management.
Oversees the operational aspects of ongoing projects and serves as a liaison between project management and planning, project team, and line management.
Manages the development and implementation process of the company’s products and services involving departmental or cross-functional teams.
Monitors project status, budgets, schedules, and prepares status reports.
Assesses project issues and develops resolutions to meet productivity, quality, and client-satisfaction goals and objectives.
Develops mechanisms for monitoring project progress, and intervenes and problem solves with project managers, line managers, and clients.
Gathers requirements, works on requirements planning, requirements elicitation, and requirements management to ensure they meet demands of project’s key stakeholders.
Communicates with stakeholders to ensure the end products or processes will solve the business problems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
PMP Certification or other formal Project Management training and experience
